title: If Jhin can crit towers and Ziggs can just delete them...
body: Let morde Q deal extra damage to towers. Maybe not FULL damage but some extra to give him a small QoL buff.

replies.body: That's not really a quality of life buff.  That's a straight up buff.

> [{quoted}](name=Nanuk Pihoqahiak,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0LhB6nJd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-02T04:09:44.183+0000)
>
> That's not really a quality of life buff.  That's a straight up buff.

well sure but mordes QoL would improve drastically

hes pretty low on the totem pole right now
Let siphoning strike gain 42 stacks on towers.

It is kind of silly that some mechanics get a damage buff against towers and some don't.

I say let everyone apply their enhancements in the interest of fairness, but also buff towers because they're paper in a game everyone's rocking chainsaw scissor rocket drill helicopters.
